name: Vain Attack
description:
Keep your tuna safe by charming the pirates and destroying their fishnets!

Controls:

W / Up Arrow - Swim
A / Left Arrow - Turn left
D / Right Arrow - Turn right
Space - Attack

Programming and Design: Felipe Nanni
Art and Design: Cajila Barbosa

This game was developed as part of Indie Speed Run 2015 (www.indiespeedrun.com).
